tha-ap25:4.2: dippati → dippeti (bj); dibbati (mr) | sāsanaṁ → jinasāsanaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap25:9.3: Yaṁ desaṁ → yaṁ yaṁ desaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed) | upapajjāmi → upagacchāmi (bj)
tha-ap25:15.3: Hasakhiḍḍasamaṅgīhaṁ → hāsakhiḍḍāsamaṅgīnaṁ (bj); sāyaṁ khiḍḍāsamaṅgīhaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); sahassakhiḍḍasamaṅgīhaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap25:25.1: Sammā dhammaṁ bhāvetvāna → mamopamaṁ karitvāna (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
